Uses of Package
jam.fit

Packages that use jam.fit
jam Root package for the Jam software package. 
jam.fit Contains classes for parametric fitting of 1-dimensional histograms. 
 

Classes in jam.fit used by jam
LoadFit
          Load a fit routine..
 

Classes in jam.fit used by jam.fit
Fit
          This defines the necessary methods that need to be defined in order for a fit routine to work with FitControl.
FitException
          Exception that is throw if there is a fit exception that can be handled inside fit
LevenbergMarquadt
          This uses the Levenberg-Marquadt prescription for finding the local minimum of chi-squared given seed parameter values for the function to fit.
Matrix
          Matrix is a generic set of linear algebra algorithms.It can accept a string argument and return a rectangular matrix array of double precision numbers, along with the row and column sizes.
NonLinearFit
          This abstract class uses LevenbergMarquadt to do non-linear parametric function fitting.
Parameter
          Parameters used to fit.
